website_summaries.verdict: Portable design makes this potty easy to take on the go. A little pricier than some models, but has a few extras that might be worth it.
pros: Folds down to the size of a briefcase and fits underneath most car seats
Two large storage compartments let you keep toilet paper or wipes at the ready
cons: Designed for use with gallon bags, but attaching the bag sometimes takes too long, resulting in accidents

customer_reviews.title: No more gross bathrooms!!
customer_reviews.text: My kid can use this potty anywhere and I don't have to worry about her using a gross bathroom. I just park somewhere and set it up in the back of the car. All the hours I spend *patiently* waiting for her to pee are slightly more enjoyable because I am not crouched in some nasty bathroom stall listening to a hand dryer. I used up some old diapers that she outgrew by putting them in doubled-up grocery bags for this. I put her old changing pad underneath it in the car, just in case. I have two of these and I might get a third.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Mama

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the coolest thing ever!!! Potty training on the go has never been easier. It has everything I need, from being compact and light weight, to the simplicity of zip lock disposable bags, to the convenience of the side storage compartments (which I use to store extra potty baggies and some M & M treats for rewards when my children potty). And it’s so easy and fast to open up to use and to pack back up. This is really important (especially with a toddler that needs to potty NOW)! It’s seriously perfect! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Candice Watson

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TRAVEL POTTY CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: Travel Potty by Cool Gear = works GREAT for 'on the road' potty stops...whether at the local park or traveling car. Keeps from having to take young children into public restrooms. Even a 4 year old can easily carry it in one hand just like a little briefcase. Easy to open, use, and clean. It has compartments for extra gallon size zip bags and wipes. It does come with a few bags. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: NAP

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent travel potty! I have had it for several months, I bought it for road trips so the kids don’t have to use a public restroom during the pandemic. It takes up so little space when folded up in the trunk. It also has a carrying handle. When set up, it is easy for both my 5 and 3 year old to use. I love that you can use gallon bags which are so easy to grab from any store.
customer_reviews.author: BRT1118

customer_reviews.title: Owned one for  3 years, still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: LEGIT LIFESAVER!!! I bought this when my daughter was 3 and it was a great alternative to have when we were out and about. She was scared of automatic flushing toilets and I was scared of nasty public toilets so this was a BIG win! It’s a good size seat, comfortable for my daughter and easy to fold and it stores everything you need!!! My kid is now 6 and we still use when we go to a park with no bathroom or camping etc. Great product so glad I got it all those years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Wow I love this. We took it for a spin yesterday. When my daughter flat out refused to go on the public bathroom toilet, we pulled this out and she went right away. Life saver. Seriously it works and folds up nicely. Just have them close their legs or it's going to splatter everywhere. Otherwise, it comes in handy. Oh btw, we just bought the regular 3-4 gallon trash bags at the store for 30/$4.99 and added paper towels for absorbency. No need to buy special bags.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tran

customer_reviews.title: seemed a little unsteady
customer_reviews.text: Liked to fold and handle for portability, the storage on sides and the fact that the bag went under the rim. But did not like the fact that you could only use it with bags. Travel a lot and didn't want to have to use bags all the time in the hotel. It also seemed somewhat unsteady when opened. and easy for child to collapse it when messing with the storage compartments. We ended up going with the Graco twisting travel potty and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: cjw

customer_reviews.title: I have three small kids and we’re always on the go (seems like their bladders are too) so this is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Such a life saver. I have three small kids and we’re always on the go (seems like their bladders are too) so this is perfect. It folds up like a briefcase. Has a decent toilet seat. I love the two storage pockets on the sides. It locks into place but easy to unlock and fold up. The toilet seat does a great job at locking in the disposable bag. Easy to ease for the kiddos. And even for an adult 😬
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great for potty training kiddos and those newly trained
customer_reviews.text: This is great for potty training kiddos and those newly trained. We have had a few issues with our average sized 2/3 year olds peeing over the front of it. It’s easier to clean up than an accident though, so that’s good. I do also have some trouble opening the side compartments. Overall I like it better than carrying our normal potty chair around in the car.
customer_reviews.author: K. Traft

customer_reviews.title: This is a great travel potty I take it everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I struggle using public bathrooms for myself and this intensified once I became a mother, just thinking about have my skin crawling. I could hug the person who thought of such a neat way of helping any parent who knows the pressure of being in a situation where the bathroom is far or not working or nasty. This is a great travel potty I take it everywhere. I wish I could use it beyond age 4 or 5 as it seems to be on the small size but for easy carry. Thank you for now use
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: BEST. INVESTMENT. EVER
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been potty trained for less than 2 weeks (thanks to the book "Oh Crap Potty Training") and we have used this product at least 2 dozen times already! In the park, at a picnic, in a mall parking lot,...anywhere you can think of lol It is so useful and clean up is a breeze since I just throw away the ziplock bag (any gallon size bag works!) Purchase this to avoid accidents!!
customer_reviews.author: Danna Habbal

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item! Super handy for traveling, or just going out with a toddler who won't go in a public restroom. Can be a bit tricky to open up, but manageable. The reason for 4 stars is that although it's sturdy and performs great, it feels very cheap. The plastic isn't smooth on the sides and the seams, it's all scratchy and "snaggy". If you're wearing something delicate, don't get it too close. ;) All in all, I believe it's the best solution for the problem. I just wish a tad more work went into making it. I'd recommend it, though.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs W.

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchasing this potty we had a three-legged one that was almost counterproductive to training due to the fact that the legs sometimes collapsed if our child wiggled at all. This one is very sturdy for sitting and very convenient in design. I trust using it in the hatchback or on the floor of the backseat of the car with no worries about spills. No longer do we have to worry about frantically finding a clean business with public facilities in which to stop when suddenly we hear those words from our toddler, " I've got to go potty!"
customer_reviews.author: art educator

customer_reviews.title: We used to keep an actual potty seat (the ones shaped like a little toilet) in our van but then we ...
customer_reviews.text: This travel potty is a life saver! With 3 kids we leave this seat in our minivan and we use it almost every time we are out for the day. We used to keep an actual potty seat (the ones shaped like a little toilet) in our van but then we would have this little bucket of pee we needed to get rid of. This one is so awesome bc the waste goes in a ziplock bag that you close up and then toss in the garbage! The 2 storage compartments on the sides are so helpful. We keep extra bags on one side and wipes on the other. I will always keep this potty in our minivan!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A necessity for traveling families with small kids
customer_reviews.text: This potty was recommended to me by a friend and it is the best! Just always leave it in your car and you solve the problem of having to find a bathroom when your young child "has to go right now". I keep it folded up for easy travel in a bag in my car along with a box of gallon ziploc bags and a roll of toilet paper. We use it all the time. It also has storage pockets on either side that you can keep your bags in. The potty uses the gallon ziploc bags that are placed under the potty seat itself. I find it easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Davis

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: A lifesaver! Helpful for the potty training child put off by strange public potties. Great for road trips, fits really well when set up on the floor of our small Honda, great when there was no time to spare. Lives in our trunk. Also allowed me to avoid putting my toddler on dirty public potties, which was nice. It could be a bit sturdier but we've had it for 3 years now with no problems. My 5 year old can still use it in a pinch. Good for camping too.
customer_reviews.author: Bofademm

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for any on-the-go family!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years for my kids. I keep it in the car for the emergency potty breaks or during potty training to have more pee breaks in between errands. I also take it camping for the kids so I don't have to do treks to the bathroom at odd hours. I like that it takes any gallon bag as an insert so you don't need any high priced item just to catch some pee and poop! It is made very sturdy and would highly recommend it. The sides I usually put some extra panties/pull ups and the other side some wipes. I just broke mine by accidentally running it over :/ and am ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: Sturgis

customer_reviews.title: This gets 5 huge stars from me. Have owned ...
customer_reviews.text: This gets 5 huge stars from me. Have owned it for about a month now and have used it more times then I can count. It most certainly comes in handy and really does offer peace of mind. My child is 3 and about 30lbs and uses it with ease. Only thing is since it sits kind of low she has to stretch her legs out in front and can't really sit in a sitting position.
customer_reviews.author: aliko

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: When my young daughter needs to pee, there's very little warning. On a road trip, that would mean disaster if a restroom is nowhere near. So many times I was able to simply pull over somewhere safe and let her relieve herself in this Travel Potty and avoid a huge mess. Along with essentials like first aid kit and flashlight, this is a must-have to keep in cars with young kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Probably great for girls - not so much for boys
customer_reviews.text: The handle and folding mechanisms are cool. The idea is great; being able to use a variety of bags is great, the storage pockets are great. Unfortunately the lip in the front is low enough to be completely useless for little boys - it goes up less than a centimeter. So unless you want to stand there and hold your kid's weiner down, or unless the kid is old enough / knowledgeable enough to hold it down himself), you WILL get pee everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J Bray

customer_reviews.title: Some sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: Compact, portable, easy to use. Only downfall for me was that the front seat has some jagged edges which scratched up the back of my baby’s calves. Had to adhere thin, foam bumpers to them for additional cushion.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, a must have for anyone with toddlers. We borrowed one from a friend when potty training our daughter but now with our son I just had to buy one. Easy to clean and store in the car and you can just use some cheap gallon ziplock bags with it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: sannetje

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have during long road trips. My 3 year old has been able to use this during long drives. When he says he has to go, we find a safe place to stop, set up the potty, shield him from the public and he is able to do his business. Because of the compact size, it can be packed in a large baby bag. The zip log bag used to collect waste is easy to dispose. Clorox/Lysol wipes can be used to quickly clean the whole unit. Although it's small, my above average toddler is able to use it. Don't let the size put you off. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gemonthego

customer_reviews.title: A must-have item for our toddler
customer_reviews.text: Love this portable potty. Our little toddler commonly goes from "I don't need to pee" to DEFCON 1 "I need to pee RIGHT NOW" in about 3 minutes, so this travel potty has saved us from a mess on multiple occasions. We carry this in the car and in the stroller pretty much everywhere we go. Worth its weight in gold. Rather than buy the refill bags, we just used regular plastic bags, and that worked fine for us (just make sure there are no holes). The storage compartment on the sides is very convenient for storing plastic bags.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for road trips!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great little potty with storage on both sides for bags and wipes. Our 3 year old was recently potty trained but I was not very comfortable bringing her into gas station bathrooms for potty breaks on long road trips. It fits perfectly under the seat in the car and we actually just used it again the other day when we got back to the car after a local park excursion and she realized she had to go asap.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Stratford

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Easy and compact! Love that you don’t need special bags, just gallon sized ziplocks. Some reviews mentioned that the side compartments don’t open. True if you don’t apply pressure to the little tab that releases the lid, but not a problem once you push the tab in slightly and lift up the lid. I can do it with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: LindsayS

customer_reviews.title: This was awesome! We ended up only needing it for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome! We ended up only needing it for a few months while my son was figuring out how to use the potty, but this is perfect to bring with you on long commutes or road trips! :) Its easy to set up, a consistent "potty" that your child is familiar with, and easy to clean up! :)
customer_reviews.author: Malia Matsuo

customer_reviews.title: I love that it folds up and that it has storage ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 year old twin boys. I have no desire to try and manage 2 toddler boys in a public restroom when I am out by myself. This potty has been a life saver. I love that it folds up and that it has storage on the side for extra bags. The only thing I don't like is that the seat is becoming increasingly uncomfortable for them to sit on. If they don't sit far enough back the pee obviously doesn't go in the hole, but sitting far enough back is seemingly uncomfortable. My boys are around the size of 2 year olds so I wouldn't say it's because they are too large for it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Robinson

customer_reviews.title: The best practical babyshower gift
customer_reviews.text: Literally worth every penny. We leave it in the van and use it alllll the time! It’s a realll lifesaver when running errands or traveling with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a God send! It is super easy to use and I love how it folds up and is out of the way. My daughter doesn't mind going on it and goes just fine. For some reason I can't seem to use the little storage compartment on it because it's super hard to open that part so I don't use the storage compartment. But there's enough storage in the car that I don't really need that part. If it wasn't for that i would've given it five stars!
customer_reviews.author: J Foster

customer_reviews.title: Best thing to purchase if you have a toddler that ...
customer_reviews.text: Best thing to purchase if you have a toddler that is scared of regular sized toilets. Convenient, easy to carry and easy to use. This will be my go to baby shower/birthday gift from now on.
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: great product!  must have luxury!
customer_reviews.text: Best $20 investment a parent can make. Ours has traveled to so many places and been such a convenience. Why take your little one to a dirty porta potty when you can bring one with disposable bags, that folds up nice and neat and has side compartments for wipes sanitizer and extra bags? This makes a great gift. So glad I got ours! Update: I purchased our potty in 2011 and it has been a great investment this far. It is now time to pass it on to baby #2. I am grateful for this item every time she says "potty" while we are out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Review Only

customer_reviews.title: This is a great travel potty
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel potty! I rated a 4 instead of a 5 because my 3yo boy is already starting to outgrow it. Not sure if the same would apply for girls. Small, easy to transport, and uses standard gallon bags. This is ideal for those that don't want to use public toilets or prefer not to use the inserts on a public toilet.
customer_reviews.author: K. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great for emergencies or to avoid public restrooms!
customer_reviews.text: We love it. We keep it in the car whenever we are out and about. Took it with us on a recent trip to Chattanooga and it was so easy at rest areas to unfold this in the back seat next to his car seat and to dispose of the contents. No mess and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: I do my research.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life???? This is THE ultimate travel potty. I store some paper towels, wipes, and gallon bags in the side storage. Then I just unfold the legs, add a paper towel and we are ready to go. Once the child uses the potty I ziplock it closed. The paper towels soak up the liquid, and I toss it in the nearest trash. I added this to the trunk of my minivan and it has been a life saver. With older ones on the go to practice, etc this is a life saver with the toddler. No more auto flusher trauma and drama with a toddler for me!
customer_reviews.author: mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Must have with toddlers!!
customer_reviews.text: All people with toddlers should have this!!!! Even just going to the store, it's a must have. Saves so much headache! And it's so much more sanitary than using the bathrooms at a lot of places.
customer_reviews.author: kbmtngrl34

customer_reviews.title: It’s a must!  Get it.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite kid product I’ve ever used. It’s sturdy and has space for extra bags. I left this at a rest stop once (I’d rather my kids use this than the toilets at the rest stop) and I bought it again 5 min later
customer_reviews.author: Katie Crocker

customer_reviews.title: We love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say how fabulous this travel potty is. Not only is it sturdy but also the fact that it folds is just nifty!! I can’t say enough good things about this potty thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: misshis18

customer_reviews.title: Stop Looking Get This One
customer_reviews.text: This is an unbelievable great travel potty. It fits standard gallon bags. It is sturdy. It folds into a suitcase like thing. It turns your car into a bathroom when your child needs one! It has pockets on the side to hold bags, wipes, and other essentials like a small hand sanitizer. We put some paper towel in the bag before he pees in it so that it is less odd to walk to a garbage can with. My son really loved to go to the bathroom in this and it has saved us in many a pinch! I can not say enough good things about this.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is 32 lbs and it holds her just fine. I took the advice of others and used ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep in my car since I have three kids five years old and under. This way if one has to go potty, I dont have to get all three kids out of the car. It's especially handy for my little girl so I don't have to worry about her touching the toilet seat in a public restroom. My daughter is 32 lbs and it holds her just fine. I took the advice of others and used the gallon Ziploc bags as liners. It fits perfectly and then you can zip up the waste until you get to a trashcan.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: GOOD JOB! This works so well
customer_reviews.text: LIFE SAVER! Put this is the back of your SUV and you never have to drive around looking for a bathroom again. We live in San Francisco where no one lets you use the bathrooms and when you do... Well our rule is that if we can get in and out by only touching our own body and nothing around us... GOOD JOB! This works so well. You drive around a bit with bags of pee and poop for a bit... But that is cool with me!
customer_reviews.author: DrSpur50

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing device to have in the car
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing device to have in the car! My daughter has recently been potty trained but still needs to go when we're on the road. This product has compartments to store extra ziplock bags and wipes. Just beware, its seems like it's complicated to open and close the compartments on the sides. If you just press on the green lid, that will easily open the compartment without any complication.
customer_reviews.author: M R

customer_reviews.title: A must have for little ones
customer_reviews.text: A must have for potty training and young kid on road trips. We have used this for 3 years and has saved us so many times. We use gallon size zip lock bags. They fit perfect! We keep it in the car with wipes in one side pocket and and bags in the other. We have used on road trips when there are no bathrooms around and gone to the car to use when public bathroom is just too gross to use. This is one of the best "baby" products we have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST portable seat EVER
customer_reviews.text: BEST portable seat EVER! We have gone through some portable seats that cannot hold the child's weight so they have to literally hold themselves above the potty. This travel seat has sturdy legs and can hold our seven year old (50+lbs) easily. It can use any disposable bag and it's super convenient that we can store toilet paper and the bag refills in the legs. The toilet folds up neatly and can slide under the car seat. A great overall purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. Gladstone

customer_reviews.title: The best must have travel potty ever.
customer_reviews.text: The best must have travel potty ever. We bought this for a 17 hour trip in the car. My 3 and 5 year old could use it just fine. We NEVER had to stop at a yukky bathroom which totally took the stress out of my vacation ! We have had to use some very disgusting bathrooms before because the kids had to go but not anymore. I wish I had bought this 3 years ago :)
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: I liked that it didn't take up much space in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful when going on road trips. Now, my kids (biggest is 45in, 44lbs) and I both have a peace of mind, knowing that we don't have to search around for clean bathrooms. Also, I liked that it didn't take up much space in the car. I reccomend buying TidyTots Disposable Potty Liner, they worked great together. The pockets on the sides were hard to open, but I didn't mind it.
customer_reviews.author: ykkmr

customer_reviews.title: Yay love it!
customer_reviews.text: This potty is awesome!!! We have an SUV... have set it up in the back and her our toddler use it with me supervising with the back open.... also used it recently while still inside the car, set it up on the third row seat... I was a bit nervous since we were on leather instead of a mat... but it was fine! I use the gallon ziplocks... and have nursing pads to absorb the liquid... but haven't bothered with those... we just pour out the contents since its just been pee so far.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: I love this potty
customer_reviews.text: If I had to choose between this and a bottle warmer I'd be going downstairs in the middle of the night to warm bottles. I love this potty. My son (age: 3) will carry it himself. He will not use any other method when we are out in public. He will not even use it in a public restroom. He has to use it in the aisle. He is scared of the loud noise of the Walmart- type of restroom.
customer_reviews.author: Tamica Gaither

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep in our mini-van for our 2 year old daughter. It is difficult using public restrooms because they are too big for her, so this has been a lifesaver for us. We just keep it in the van, along with a box of 1 gallon ziplock baggies to put in it. It makes long driving trips much easier because we can just pull over when she has to go, instead of having to find a rest stop or restaurant and deal with helping her sit on a toilet that is too big for her and having to deal with the germs in a public restroom.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Buy, Buy
customer_reviews.text: We use it for on the “go” in the car. Go to your favorite supermarket and buy one gallon zip lock bags in bulk and DONE!!!! They fit great around the circle under the snap-on seat. The built in bag storage / stand for it is great!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rene Murillo

customer_reviews.title: best travel potty
customer_reviews.text: best travel potty! I love the side storage areas - perfect for storing baby wipes, hand sanitizer and extra gallon sized bags. I bought the cheapie gallon sized bags from the dollar store to use with this and they work lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Thrilled Mama

customer_reviews.title: Love that it has built-in storage
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and a great size for my 19 month old. I love that it fits regular gallon ziplock bags (instead of having to purchase specific bags as other brands require) and that it has the 2 storage compartments on either side for the bags and everything else with need. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: the best part is that it requires no special bags
customer_reviews.text: an absolute must have for potty training kids. the best part is that it requires no special bags, just use any gallon size zip lock bag. pretty slim and compact for a portable kids potty. i can throw in the stroller and take it with us on outings.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It's just what I wanted: compact, functional, easy clean ups. I have a 2 year old who was fully potty trained at 21 months. Imagine having two kids under 5, a full shopping cart full of groceries, the furthest parking spot and an immediate request to go potty as I am opening the trunk to load the groceries...It used to be a horror scene but not anymore. That's when I appreciate this little portable potty in the car!
customer_reviews.author: MouseMe

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Satisfaction with this product depends on your need. For potty training on the go this is a must to contain/ dispose of the mess with very little fuss. Everything latches in place for a secure seat for the child to sit on. For the parent... be smart enough to put presser on the release latch before trying to fold the seat or open compartments. I loved that it came with a few bags to get you started. A nice touch to show a consumer centric focus.
customer_reviews.author: April M. Graves

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to other parents all the time
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest and most convenient thing ever invented. I keep it in the car for emergency potty stops in the middle of nowhere and I also carry it in the back of my stroller when we're walking trails where there are no bathrooms. I have an almost five year old, three year old, and almost two year old that use it and it fits them all well. I recommend this to other parents all the time!
customer_reviews.author: LaurelP

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I no longer panic that my toddler will need to go potty when we are out and about. This plus disposable gloves and wipes are a must
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for road trip!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4-year-old for road trips. Definitely a life saver! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this since you can set it up in seconds ...
customer_reviews.text: The ring is too small! when my boy sits on it, there's no way to tuck his stuff to point down. I really wanted to like this since you can set it up in seconds and it seems sturdy but without a splashguard, this just doesn't work for us. Back to the oxo potty.
customer_reviews.author: ASL888

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great design.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three of these (my car, wife's car, and the in-laws' car), and all have held up well. These are compact, sturdy, and comfortable according to our toddler). The side storage compartments are relatively large and useful - one side for gallon size freezer Ziploc bags and the other for feminine pads to help absorb the urine so less of an issue with handling and disposal.
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best travel potty seat ever
customer_reviews.text: Best travel potty seat ever! Convinced several friends to buy this one and this is my second time buying it here (first one was two years old - daughter broke one of the side lids a long time ago and then recently the handle). Wouldn't even care - you just throw the bag away when they finish going and you can easily fold it to put under stroller if going to beach or hike, etc. love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dewhurst

customer_reviews.title: Great travel potty!
customer_reviews.text: Love this travel potty. Such a good idea. The sides are excellent for storage - I have ziplocs and store brand pads (throw them in the ziploc when you are ready to use or done and you won't have a bag of pee waiting to spring a leak) in one side and wipes and toilet paper in the other. Everything is is one spot, just grab the potty and you are ready to roll. My daughter has no problem using it. She can even unfold the sides and set it up by herself. Sooo much better than trying to find a public bathroom or using a questionable one.
customer_reviews.author: Erica R

customer_reviews.title: Helped us get the 3 year old fully potty trained and her sister who is 1  is almost there too....a must
customer_reviews.text: Best invention ever. This helped us get our daughter who is 3 fully potty trained and our 1 year old is almost there thanks to this product. We keep them in all the cars. No more running home or looking for a dirty bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This potty is great. My daughter loves it. We just buy cheap gallon bags at the store and it works perfectly. It sets up easy and fast. The side storage is not large enough for a roll of toilet paper so I store the gallon bags in one and wipes and pull ups in the other. I just try to keep a roll of toilet paper in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Travel Easy.
customer_reviews.text: One less thing to stress about while traveling. Nice to have in the vehicle! Convenient. Clean. Folds down to save space.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great portable potty!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't to you how much I appreciate this product. My kids are scared of public bathrooms and I had no clue what to do about it. A friend recommended this potty to me. We keep it in the back of our SUV and the kids use it when we are out and about if they need to use the bathroom. I bought a box of 60 gallon bags and leave them in the car. I love that you put the bags around the lip and there is no mess when cleaning up.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Hill

customer_reviews.title: looks great when closed
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use in car, looks great when closed. However I would prefer it to have a little cover in front to shield the pee pee when the kud is sitting down to use the potty.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: folds up under the car seat... easy to use, and seal in 1 gallon storage bags, so the smell is bearable until you can get it thrown away in a dumpster! Great Product and well liked by the kids! Our twins are 3 yrs old and won't fit it for much longer, but great for potty training on the road!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Outings!
customer_reviews.text: This potty has been perfect to go out and about with. When my twins were 3 weeks in to potty training, we took a 9 hour road trip and only had 1 accident thanks to this potty. My only complaint would be that it doesn't have a rise to the seat for boys, but none of the travel potties I saw did. I love how easily this folds up. I put it my 31 utility tote and throw extra clothes in there and it is still easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Carla B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers newly potty trained
customer_reviews.text: Live this keep it im my car for my toddler,easy for her to use and easy to pull over when she need to go. instead if using the clear bags it comes with.so much easier to buy the rolls of bags from walmart or target.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful travel potty!!!
customer_reviews.text: This potty is so great for in the car and on the go potty stops. Before I used the frog style potty but always had the issue of what to do with the pee and poop when we were out and about. This potty makes clean up so easy and you can use any gallon size zippered bag to seal it up and dispose of it after your child goes potty. I also like that it has easy storage for wipes, zipper bags, etc. It is also nice that the way it folds up when not in use makes it less obvious that it is a potty. Wouldn't leave home without it for my potty training toddler.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase for on-the-go lifestyle with toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect purchase for my 2.5yr old who loves to use it when we are at parks that do not have clean public bathrooms (which is often). Many other parents have asked me where can they get one. - pro: Easy to use with any type of plastic bag Comfortable for child to sit on Great for keeping in back of car for access on-the-go - con: While the size works well it is not something you can slip in a small diaper bag. This is not a big deal to me, but mentioning since that might be a requirement for some. Happy I own this product.
customer_reviews.author: Olive Hess

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I heard about it from a friend and I love the ease of portability and set up. We travel in the car and it stores wonderful underneath the seats in the back. My daughter can use it just about anywhere! Very useful and would recommed to all parents who are potty training or not, it's just great to HAVE!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to travel with
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and I have peace of mind. It is a bit stiff to use at first but you want that. It is a MUCH better alternative then a public restroom when traveling in the car with an infant and a toddler. It made our trip a lot less stressful. I would recommend it for anyone going through potty training or simply going on a long car trip with little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy L Gallatin

customer_reviews.title: My son does not like public toilets so this is great
customer_reviews.text: This travel potty has saved us on more than one occasion. My son does not like public toilets so this is great, we just set it up in the car and he's good to go. I would recommend that you put toilet paper or paper towels in the bag to help absorb the urine.
customer_reviews.author: Holli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent travel potty
customer_reviews.text: This travel potty really exceeded our expectations. We were looking for something a little more substantial but still light and compact - and this fits the bill. The storage containers on each side are great for TP, wipes and bags - plus they make the seat very stable. It is too big to fit into a standard diaper bag, but light enough to throw into a stroller basket or be carried around by a two year old (our daughter loves to move it around). I highly recommend for travel. It is also really nice that the child does not sit directly on the bag. Very easy to clean and compact. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: JHGmom

customer_reviews.title: Travel potty
customer_reviews.text: This is a MUST have for travel. I leave it in the car and it has made traveling easy for our 2yo who is potty trained. Great for the park/beach/fairs no more nasty ports potties.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Ouellette

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This potty is great! Super easy to use and fold up. My daughter loves folding it out, sitting on it & folding it back up again - when she's not going potty! A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. James

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use & Carry
customer_reviews.text: This is a definitely must have for all parents in the potty training stage, I took mine to central park, NY and worked like a charm for both of my girls (2 & 6 year old). it is also helpful on the road and very easy to use with ziploc bags, it is not super robust but do the job and it can fit in a 16" back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Dudo

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is great because my 3 year old can carry it herself. I wish that when it was folded up the inside of the ring wasn't visible from one side. I guess I would like it to be a bit more discrete. We have to bring it in with us if we go to a store or a restaurant b/c my little one is afraid of the big toilet (one auto flushed on her, WILL NOT USE THEM AGAIN). Overall, good design, like the storage on the sides for the liners / bags / tp. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: I cannot imagine the life without it. My girl ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot imagine the life without it. My girl is potty trained but she refuses to use any adult toilets. We have been taking this portable potty everywhere with us as far as China. It makes life a lot easier for us.
customer_reviews.author: Malena

customer_reviews.title: Best travel potty ever.
customer_reviews.text: Makes potty training a breeze! Keeps everything where u need it. Super easy to take on a stroll with u or anywhere where restrooms arent readily available. Now that my toddler has moved on to the potty ring on the public toilets this is our van potty.
customer_reviews.author: Jade*

customer_reviews.title: Awesome travel potty!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this potty. Easy to travel with and easy to use! We went camping and used this potty the entire weekend, no issues, I keep it in my car just in case we have to stop and it is so quick to get out! Fabulous travel potty!
customer_reviews.author: Juliejules

customer_reviews.title: OMG a total life saver, especially when driving long ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG a total life saver, especially when driving long distance. No more need to go into sketchy bathrooms, unsanitary, and having my kids touch yucky things in there... now they can go anytime they need and I've loaded up on the gallon size ziplock bags from costco... just use, zip up and throw away... no more mess and having to worry about unsanitary restrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Duc Tran

customer_reviews.title: This was way too small! Now it just sits ...
customer_reviews.text: This was way too small! Now it just sits there, definitely not something I would ever tell anyone to get.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Best travel potty ever! Well worth the money. So easy to use and clean up. I keep it in my car for emergencies. The storage space on either side is great - one side for bags, the other side for toilet paper/wipes. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Christal

customer_reviews.title: Too small for 3 yr old
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this would’ve been a good potty but it was too small for a 3 year old
customer_reviews.author: G.L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this potty chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this potty chair!! Took it as carry-on to Maui and it was so helpful. My 3 year old loves it! Just use one gallon zip-lock bags and you're all set. I keep it in the car and use it when we are out and about!
customer_reviews.author: FF

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but did not work for us:(
customer_reviews.text: We tried it multiple times for our son while travelling and he hates it. We ended up getting other simple one from Walmart. He kept saying that it hurts his back. Edges are really fine on this one. Also there is pee guard on it, so pee goes everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Raag

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My baby took this thing everywhere until she no longer needed it! I wish I had it with my first child!
customer_reviews.author: shermondria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our 2.5 year old and it works perfectly. Just be sure the bag is opened all the way since it can come back at you if you have any creases. We use 13 gallon tag bags to save money on the ziplocs. They work just as well. It's sturdy and collapses into a compact size for room saving.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great little potty for road trips and parents who don't like public restrooms
customer_reviews.text: We keep this potty in the car for road trips and when we're out and about. Everything is sound and it works as it should. But the best thing about this item is that you can use any regular gallon ziploc bag. No special size that requires you to keep buying from the manufacturer at higher prices. Just go to the dollar store and pickup cheap gallon bags and you're in business. My wife and I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Traveling Potty
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST potty traveling gear ever! I recommend it for all the parents who are potty training their baby/toddler. It has two side compartments which have enough space for a water wipes, the 1 gallon zipper bags, and pull-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Broccolihart

customer_reviews.title: and my daughter thinks it's fun to carry around
customer_reviews.text: Clever design, compact, and my daughter thinks it's fun to carry around. Very convenient to just use ziplocks. I've even put a cloth diaper inside to save on ziplocks. Easy to use, refill, and keep clean. The side storage pockets open easily if one presses down slightly while pushing the release button.
customer_reviews.author: JLJ

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this purchase. My LO loves it so much that she would rather pee in this than a regular bathroom. We have been using it for 4 weeks now. I go running in the morning and it fits under the bob stroller just barely. The seat slides out smoothly and is easy to open and close. The carrying case has two side pockets. It holds a good amount or plastic bags, tissue paper, extra charge of clothes and hand sanitizer. When I carry it, no one ever knows what it is, it's so discrete.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just brilliant. This has saved us more than once
customer_reviews.text: Just brilliant. This has saved us more than once. Love the side compartments, too. They're just big enough to hold wipes, a second outfit, and extra bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda's Deep Thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver. I don't know what I'd do without it. Every parent needs one in their car, especially if you have more than 1 kid. It is convenient for me to pull over anywhere when my kid has to go. It's compact. It's really one of my favorite kid products and definitely a MUST HAVE.
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE T.

customer_reviews.title: A must for any family with young ones that are ...
customer_reviews.text: A must for any family with young ones that are either new to potty training or are accident-prone. We have taken this gem to the park, the beach, and leave it in the car otherwise. We never have accidents anymore thanks to the convenience of the Travel Potty!!!
customer_reviews.author: Y. S. Medellin

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This travel potty is great! We have it set up in the back of our minivan for those times when we are out and about without access to a potty. We use the disposable bags and haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: i highly recommend it. my son was recently potty trained and ...
customer_reviews.text: this travel potty is such a gem! i highly recommend it. my son was recently potty trained and this potty was perfect to bring anywhere with us. he was scared to use the "big potty" everywhere. ( he didn't like how loud the flush was at public restrooms etc) it looks like a little suitcase so its perfect for traveling anywhere. zoos, parks ,beaches etc. best travel potty ever.
customer_reviews.author: DSouz

product_meta.title: Travel Potty
product_meta.description: Cool Gear Travel Potty When you've gotta go, you've gotta go. And when there's no clean restroom in sight, you'll be very thankful you brought along this handy little travel potty. Durable and lightweight, it folds up to the size of a small briefcase. To use, simply pull the recessed grips to open, slide the sides down, and lock into place. Lift up the seat, insert a resealable gallon-sized storage bag over the lid, and then close the seat to lock the bag in place. When your child is done, remove the bag, seal it shut, and dispose of the contents. The seat even has two storage compartments on either side to hold the bags, wipes, and a change of underwear or training pants.Open dimensions: 12 1/2'L x 10'W x 6 1/2'H; folded dimensions: 12 1/2'L x 10'W x 3 1/2'H
feature_bullets: Easy to use and carry, Folds to compact briefcase size.
Two large compartments provide room for storage.
You will receive (1) Cool Gear Travel Potty .

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars494 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
